DOC.brief_title: Therapy With Topotecan Carboplatin Patients With Relapsed Ovarian Cancer
DOC.criteria: Age > = 18 year patient ovarian cancer primary therapy bone marrow function leukocytes > = 4,0 x 109/ l , platelet > = 100 109/l , hemoglobin > = 9 g/dl renal function creatinin < = 1,5 mg % creatinin clearance > = 60 ml/min liver function bilirubin < = 2,0 mg/dl , SGOT , SGPT AP within 3 fold reference laboratory 's normal range ECOG < = 2 Intention regular followup visit duration study write informed consent know hypersensitivity topotecan isomeraseIinhibitor medication include study protocol ECOG > 2 patient radiotherapy within last 4 week
